title: STOP ASKING FOR EVELYN LOVE
body: Won't happen she negates all of riots pet overpowered vision fake gameplay. Must allow ward spam and give 100% vision for #lcs, next up just remove fog of war.

replies.body: Evelynn has decent damage right now in a more crowd control team, but her passive is really lackluster. A passive change with a few other SMALL tweaks could happen and she would be fine.

> [{quoted}](name=Inept Maverick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tbZVswTI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-16T02:30:34.042+0000)
>
> Evelynn has decent damage right now in a more crowd control team, but her passive is really lackluster. A passive change with a few other SMALL tweaks could happen and she would be fine.

What if instead of or on top of mana regen from her passive she got a slight boost in ad or resistances upon leaving stealth. Something like Kha'zix's unseen threat?

>
> What if instead of or on top of mana regen from her passive she got a slight boost in ad or resistances upon leaving stealth. Something like Kha'zix's unseen threat?
